sentences.sContent: The kinase transfers the phosphate from an autophosphorylated histidine and thus (why thus?) is often reversible, with the kinase acting as a phosphatase as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: The kinase transfers the phosphate from an autophosphorylated histidine and thus (why thus?) is often reversible, with the kinase acting as a phosphatase as well.
sentences.sCn: 这个激酶从自我磷酸的组氨酸上转移磷酸基，因此（为什么是这样）通常是可逆的，这个激酶也作为一个去磷酸酶。

trans.tranOther: a nonessential amino acid that occurs in most proteins: a precursor of histamine
